snippet.title: SomnaBuster - LAUNCH TRAILER
snippet.description:
SomnaBuster is NOW AVAILABLE on Steam and Itch.io for $14.99 USD!!

Accounting student Macy is down on her luck and out of her mind. But, her life of hum-drum meets an abrupt interruption at the visit of a mysterious firefly. In her place, a witch-like spirit wakes up in Esperanto, a strange world manifested from the hearts and dreams of all. With an explosive broom in tow, our hero sets out to discover the mysteries of Esperanto and find her home - wherever it may be.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2598190/SomnaBuster/
Itch.io: https://pd-cgt.itch.io/somnabuster2024
